languages.text: "Цугцванг, {name}. Каждый... следующий... ход делает положение все хуже. И для меня... и для тех, кого я должен оберегать".

traits.locale_text: "Цугцванг, {name}. Каждый... следующий... ход делает положение все хуже. И для меня... и для тех, кого я должен оберегать".

languages.text: "Zugzwang, {name}. Every... subsequent... move puts me in an even worse position. Me... and the people I'm supposed to protect."
languages.original_text: "Цугцванг, {name}. Каждый... следующий... ход делает положение все хуже. И для меня... и для тех, кого я должен оберегать".

traits.locale_text: "Zugzwang, {name}. Every... subsequent... move puts me in an even worse position. Me... and the people I'm supposed to protect."
"Zugzwang, {name}. Every... subsequent... move puts me in an even worse position. Me... and the people I'm supposed to protect."
"Zugzwang, {name}. Every... subsequent... move puts me in an even worse position. Me... and the people I'm supposed to protect."
"Zugzwang, {name}. Every... subsequent... move puts me in an even worse position. Me... and the people I'm supposed to protect."

languages.text: “无路可走了，{name}。在那之后……走的每一步……都只会让我的处境更加糟糕。不只是我……还有我本该保护的那些人。”
languages.original_text: "Zugzwang, {name}. Every... subsequent... move puts me in an even worse position. Me... and the people I'm supposed to protect."

traits.locale_text: “无路可走了，{name}。在那之后……走的每一步……都只会让我的处境更加糟糕。不只是我……还有我本该保护的那些人。”

languages.text: «Zugzwang, {name}. Cada... acción... posible me pone en una posición peor. A mí... y a la gente a la que debo proteger».
languages.original_text: "Zugzwang, {name}. Every... subsequent... move puts me in an even worse position. Me... and the people I'm supposed to protect."

traits.locale_text: «Zugzwang, {name}. Cada... acción... posible me pone en una posición peor. A mí... y a la gente a la que debo proteger».

languages.text: 「ツグツワンだ、{name}。一つ一つの手が、俺の立場を悪化させていく。俺と…俺を守ろうとしている人々のな」
languages.original_text: "Zugzwang, {name}. Every... subsequent... move puts me in an even worse position. Me... and the people I'm supposed to protect."

traits.locale_text: 「ツグツワンだ、{name}。一つ一つの手が、俺の立場を悪化させていく。俺と…俺を守ろうとしている人々のな」

languages.text: « Zugzwang, {name}. Mon prochain coup, quel qu'il soit, ne fera qu'empirer ma situation. La mienne... et celle de ceux que je suis censé protéger. »
languages.original_text: "Zugzwang, {name}. Every... subsequent... move puts me in an even worse position. Me... and the people I'm supposed to protect."

traits.locale_text: « Zugzwang, {name}. Mon prochain coup, quel qu'il soit, ne fera qu'empirer ma situation. La mienne... et celle de ceux que je suis censé protéger. »

languages.text: "Zugzwang, {name}. Jeder weiterer Schritt verschlechtert meine Position. Meine ... und die der Menschen, die ich beschützen soll."
languages.original_text: "Zugzwang, {name}. Every... subsequent... move puts me in an even worse position. Me... and the people I'm supposed to protect."

traits.locale_text: "Zugzwang, {name}. Jeder weiterer Schritt verschlechtert meine Position. Meine ... und die der Menschen, die ich beschützen soll."

languages.text: "Zorunlu hamle {name}. Takip eden... Tüm... Hamleler, beni olabilecek en kötü konuma soktu. Beni ve... Korumam gereken insanları..."
languages.original_text: "Zugzwang, {name}. Every... subsequent... move puts me in an even worse position. Me... and the people I'm supposed to protect."
